snippet.title: Doom & Destiny - What is Doom & Destiny?
snippet.description:
You still don't know what is Doom & Destiny ? 
Well, here it is the answer in less than 40 seconds!

Four nerds, drawn into a fantasy world and mistaken for heroes, have to battle their way through a massive, crazy adventure and defeat a preposterous villian!

This great RPG has magic, dungeons, pizza, and jokes galore. If you ever enjoyed "Final Fantasy", "Chrono Trigger", "Secret of Mana", or "Dungeons & Dragons", you're gonna love this game!

The game is available on XBLIG, Desura, Windows Phone, Windows 8, Google Play and iTunes!

Support D&D on Greenlight: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=93788887&searchtext
Official Site: http://doomanddestiny.com/
Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/DoomAndDestiny
Twitter: http://twitter.com/#!/doomNdestiny

Music by Stefano Cremona ( https://soundcloud.com/stefanocremona )
